adoption_flow.title: Submit Application
adoption_flow.copy: Tell us about your home, experience, and preferences. Approval is required before payment.

adoption_flow.title: Application Review
adoption_flow.copy: We evaluate fit carefully to ensure the best match for kittens and guardians.

adoption_flow.title: Payment & Confirmation
adoption_flow.copy: Pay deposit or full amount via Zelle/PayPal F&F and upload proof. We confirm by email.

adoption_flow.title: Sign Agreement
adoption_flow.copy: E‑sign the guardianship agreement; receive certificate details.

adoption_flow.title: Schedule Pickup
adoption_flow.copy: Local delivery in LA area or fly‑in pickup; no cargo for Sphynx.
